official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow certain employees of the National Transportation Safety Board to receive civil service retirement credit for their service under the Federal railroad retirement program.

summary.text: Allows certain employees of the National Transportation Safety Board to receive civil service retirement credit for prior service creditable under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974. Disallows credit under such Act or the Social Security Act for any service for which civil service retirement credit is allowed. Requires no deposits into the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund for such credited service.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow certain employees of the National Transportation Safety Board to receive civil service retirement credit for their service under the Federal railroad retirement program.
